user_query: I am hosting a conference for my company and I want to send SMS reminders to all the registered attendees. Can you help me send bulk SMS messages to the attendees' phone numbers using the Rivet SMS tool? I also need to retrieve the message replies history from SMS77io to monitor any inquiries or feedback from the attendees.

TaskList.description: Compile a list of registered attendees and their phone numbers.
Using the compiled list, send bulk SMS reminders to the attendees using the Rivet SMS tool.
Retrieve the replies history from SMS77io to monitor feedback and inquiries from the attendees.
